ja403:4.2: yācañhi yācati → yācaṁpi yācati (sya1ed, sya2ed); yācāni yācati (pts-vp-pli1); yācanaṁ yācati (mr); yācati yācanaṁ (bj -nissya)
ja403:5.1: Na ve dessanti → na ve dissanti (bj); na ve dussanti (sya1ed, sya2ed); na ve dissanti (pts-vp-pli1); na videssanti (mr aṭṭha.)
ja403:5.4: Vada tvaṁ → vara taṁ (bj); vara (sya1ed, sya2ed); vara tvaṁ (pts-vp-pli1) | bhaññamicchasi → bhaññitamicchasi (sya1ed, sya2ed); yaññamicchasi (?)
